title: SAMPARC MEDICAL Hospital Website with Admin Dashboard & AI Assistant

requirements.text: Create a professional, animated, and visually attractive public-facing hospital website for SAMPARC MEDICAL with a clean medical theme (white, teal/green, and gold accents), smooth scroll animations, hero section, and consistent typography throughout all pages.

quotes: design my website like professional designer and make it animative and attractive

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section has animated entrance with hospital name and tagline
Smooth scroll animations on all major sections
Consistent color palette of white, teal/green, and gold used site-wide
Responsive design works on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Navigation menu has buttons: Home, About Us, Services, Medicines, Contact Us, Admin

requirements.text: Design and generate a custom logo for SAMPARC MEDICAL (a medical cross or caduceus symbol combined with the hospital name) and display it prominently in the header/navbar of the website.

quotes: make logo for my MEDICAL and put it on website with name

acceptanceCriteria: Logo is displayed in the top navigation bar
Logo includes a medical symbol and the text 'SAMPARC MEDICAL'
Logo is served from frontend/public/assets/generated

requirements.text: Add an 'About Us' section on the public website featuring professional bios for Founder Director/Secretary AMITKUMAR BANERJEE and CEO ANUJ SINGH, with positive, professionally written descriptions about their vision, leadership, and contributions to healthcare.

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays AMITKUMAR BANERJEE as Founder Director/Secretary with a bio
Section displays ANUJ SINGH as CEO with a bio
Both bios are professionally written and highlight their healthcare leadership
Section is visually appealing with cards or profile layout

requirements.text: Implement an AI chat assistant widget on the public website (floating button in the bottom-right corner) that allows customers to ask questions about the hospital, services, medicines, and general health queries. The assistant should respond helpfully using pre-defined knowledge and scripted responses about SAMPARC MEDICAL. It should also be able to answer general medical FAQ questions.

quotes: add ai assistant some like chat gpt that can answers all questions and create anything can write anything

acceptanceCriteria: Floating chat button visible on all public pages
Chat window opens with a greeting from the SAMPARC MEDICAL assistant
Handles questions about hospital location, hours, services, contact info
Displays customer care number +91 9766343454 when asked about support
Shows a message for unanswerable queries suggesting to call/WhatsApp

requirements.text: Create a Medicines/Pharmacy section on the public website that displays the list of available medicines stored in the backend, with name, description, and price fields visible to visitors.

quotes: admin can add medicine's

acceptanceCriteria: Public medicines page lists all medicines added by admin
Each medicine card shows name, description, and price
Page is responsive and styled consistently with the site theme
Medicines data is fetched from the backend canister

requirements.text: Implement backend storage for medicines in the Motoko main actor with full CRUD operations: add medicine, edit medicine, delete medicine, and list all medicines. Each medicine record should have: id, name, description, price, category, and availability status.

quotes: admin can add medicine's
can edit website and can also manage website

acceptanceCriteria: addMedicine, updateMedicine, deleteMedicine, getMedicines functions exist in main actor
Medicine record has id (Nat), name (Text), description (Text), price (Float), category (Text), available (Bool)
Medicines persist in stable storage across upgrades
Functions return appropriate result types

requirements.text: Implement backend storage for editable website content sections (hero text, about text, services list, announcements) in the Motoko main actor so the admin can update public-facing content. Provide getContent and updateContent functions keyed by section name.

quotes: can edit website and can also manage website
I can manage all content from admin dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: getContent(key: Text) and updateContent(key: Text, value: Text) functions exist
Content stored in stable HashMap or TrieMap
Default content pre-populated for hero, about, services sections
Functions accessible from the frontend
